AzureAd.Domain: [Enter the domain of your tenant, e.g. contoso.onmicrosoft.com]
AzureAd.ClientId: [Enter the Client Id (Application ID obtained from the Azure portal)
AzureAd.TenantId: [Enter 'common', or 'organizations' or the Tenant Id (Obtained from the Azure portal. Select 'Endpoints' from the 'App registrations' blade and use the GUID in any of the URLs)
